original: ‘pākatikaaggito nerayiko aggi mahābhitāpataro hoti, khuddakopi pāsāṇo pākatike aggimhi
analyzed: pākatika aggitaḥ nerayikaḥ aggi mahā abhitāpataraḥ hoti khuddakaḥ api pāsāṇaḥ pākatike aggimhi

original: pakkhitto divasampi paccamāno na vilayaṁ gacchati, kūṭāgāramattopi pāsāṇo nerayikaggimhi
analyzed: pakkhittaḥ divasam pi paccamānaḥ na vilayam gacchati kūṭāgāra mattaḥ api pāsāṇaḥ nerayika ggimhi

original: pakkhitto khaṇena vilayaṁ gacchatī’ti, etaṁ vacanaṁ na saddahāmi, evañca pana vadetha
analyzed: pakkhittaḥ khaṇena vilayam gacchati iti etam vacanam na saddahāmi evam ca pana vadetha

original: ‘ye ca tattha uppannā sattā, te anekānipi vassasahassāni niraye paccamānā na vilayaṁ
analyzed: ye ca tattha uppannā sattā te anekāni api vassa sahassāni niraye paccamānāḥ na vilaya
gacchanti iti vacanam na sat dahāmi iti

original: “taṁ kiṁ maññasi, mahārāja, yā tā santi makariniyopi susumāriniyopi kacchapiniyopi moriniyopi kapotiniyopi, kiṁ nu tā kakkhaḷāni pāsāṇāni sakkharāyo ca khādantī”ti?
analyzed: tam kim maññasi mahā rāja yā tā santi makariniyopi susumāriniyopi kacchapiniyopi moriniyopi kapotiniyopi kim nu tā kakkhaḷāni pāsāṇāni sakkharāyo ca khādanti iti

original: “Kiṁ pana tāni tāsaṁ kucchiyaṁ koṭṭhabbhantaragatāni vilayaṁ gacchantī”ti?
analyzed: kim pana tāni tāsam kucchiyam koṭṭhabbha antara gatāni vilayam gacchanti iti

original: “Yo pana tāsaṁ kucchiyaṁ gabbho, sopi vilayaṁ gacchatī”ti?
analyzed: yaḥ pana tāsam kucchiyam gabbho saḥ api vilayam gacchati iti
maññāmi bhante kamma adhikatena na vilayam gacchati iti

original: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, kammādhikatena nerayikā sattā anekānipi vassasahassāni niraye paccamānā na vilayaṁ gacchanti.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja kamma adhika tena nerayikāḥ sattāḥ anekāni api vassa sahassāni niraye paccamānāḥ na vilayam gacchanti

original: ‘so na tāva kālaṁ karoti, yāva na taṁ pāpakammaṁ byantīhotī’”ti.
analyzed: saḥ na tāva kālam karoti yāva na tam pāpa kammam byantīhoti iti

original: “Taṁ kiṁ maññasi, mahārāja, yā tā santi sīhiniyopi byagghiniyopi dīpiniyopi kukkuriniyopi, kiṁ nu tā kakkhaḷāni aṭṭhikāni maṁsāni khādantī”ti?
analyzed: tam kim maññasi mahā rāja yā tā santi sīhiniyopi byagghiniyopi dīpiniyopi kukkuriniyopi kim nu tā kakkhaḷāni aṭṭhikāni masāni khādanti iti

original: “Kiṁ pana tāni tāsaṁ kucchiyaṁ koṭṭhabbhantaragatāni vilayaṁ gacchantī”ti?
analyzed: kim pana tāni tāsam kucchiyam koṭṭhabbha antara gatāni vilayam gacchanti iti

original: “Yo pana tāsaṁ kucchiyaṁ gabbho, sopi vilayaṁ gacchatī”ti?
analyzed: yaḥ pana tāsam kucchiyam gabbho saḥ api vilayam gacchati iti
maññāmi bhante kamma adhikatena na vilayam gacchati iti

original: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, kammādhikatena nerayikā sattā anekānipi vassasahassāni niraye paccamānā na vilayaṁ gacchantī”ti.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja kamma adhika tena nerayikāḥ sattāḥ anekāni api vassa sahassāni niraye paccamānāḥ na vilayam gacchanti iti

original: “Taṁ kiṁ maññasi, mahārāja, yā tā santi yonakasukhumāliniyopi khattiyasukhumāliniyopi
analyzed: tam kim maññasi mahā rāja yā tā santi yonaka sukhu māliniyaḥ api khattiya sukhu māliniyaḥ api

original: brāhmaṇasukhumāliniyopi gahapatisukhumāliniyopi, kiṁ nu tā kakkhaḷāni khajjakāni
analyzed: brāhmaṇa sukhu māliniyaḥ api gahapati sukhu māliniyaḥ api kim nu tā kakkhaḷāni khajjakāni

original: “Kiṁ pana tāni tāsaṁ kucchiyaṁ koṭṭhabbhantaragatāni vilayaṁ gacchantī”ti?
analyzed: kim pana tāni tāsam kucchiyam koṭṭhabbha antara gatāni vilayam gacchanti iti

original: “Yo pana tāsaṁ kucchiyaṁ gabbho sopi vilayaṁ gacchatī”ti?
analyzed: yaḥ pana tāsam kucchiyam gabbho saḥ api vilayam gacchati iti
maññāmi bhante kamma adhikatena na vilayam gacchati iti

original: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, kammādhikatena nerayikā sattā anekānipi vassasahassāni niraye paccamānā na vilayaṁ gacchanti.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja kamma adhika tena nerayikāḥ sattāḥ anekāni api vassa sahassāni niraye paccamānāḥ na vilayam gacchanti

original: ‘so na tāva kālaṁ karoti, yāva na taṁ pāpakammaṁ byantīhotī’”ti.
analyzed: saḥ na tāva kālam karoti yāva na tam pāpa kammam byantīhoti iti
